channel.title: Door require key?
channel.description: How would i make a varrock door, code 2398, require a key to enter, and when you have key it teleports you to the coordinates i want? Im using hiyascape server base, all help is appreciated!!THANKS!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2008, 09:17:01 PM[/size][hr]who ever helps will get admin status on my server
